title: Funny As: The Story of New Zealand Comedy
overview: Funny As: The Story of New Zealand Comedy opens up the archives to offer a funny and fascinating tour through New Zealand's rich comedy history.Interviewing comedy greats alongside the best and brightest up-and-comers, including Ginette McDonald, Mike King, Oscar Kightley, Rhys Darby, Rose Matafeo, The Topp Twins and many more, Funny As is a candid and hilarious look at the untold stories behind some of New Zealand's most iconic performances.
